entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH, BECOMING WEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
